Description: This bulletin provides information about homelessness in Scotland, with a focus on the equalities characteristics of homeless applicants.
Name: Homelessness in Scotland:  Equalities Breakdown
Notes: There are 2 spreadsheets, one is titled tables and the other charts. There are similarities between the  2 spreadsheets and there may be some duplication, however there are some areas covered by one and not the other.  May also be linked to the Disabilities , Mental Health and Learning disabilities families.
Route from landing page to data: Data can be found by clicking on the Excel tables and charts link  for the latest publication. this opens another web page   where 2 XLSX  files can be accessed  1 as a table and the other as a  chart.
Sizing Notes: Messy structure with multiple tables and charts on the tabs with footnotes.  May take a while to determine  dimensions.
